meanings.definition: A person who delivers or distributes goods or services.
meanings.sent1: The deliverers brought fresh vegetables to our door every week.
meanings.sent2: The postal deliverers work hard to bring us our mail on time.
meanings.sent3: The deliverers accidentally left a package at the wrong house, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: The deliverers were like Santa Claus, bringing joy and surprises to our home.
meanings.sent5: The deliverers always wear bright uniforms, making them easy to spot in the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: A person who rescues or saves others from danger or harm.
meanings.sent1: The brave deliverers rushed into the burning building to save the trapped residents.
meanings.sent2: The lifeguards at the beach are true deliverers, always ready to help those in trouble.
meanings.sent3: The deliverers in the action movie saved the day with their quick thinking and courage.
meanings.sent4: The deliverers of hope arrived just in time to lift the spirits of the weary travelers.
meanings.sent5: The deliverers of kindness spread positivity wherever they went, making the world a better place.
